Everything in Milkdown are plugins. Extend your editor with different types of plugins: syntax, theme, UI, etc.

With the support of Y.js, Milkdown can be used in real-time collaborative editing which can support multiple users editing on the same documentation.

Milkdown is headless and comes without any CSS. You can easily customize the editor to fit the style of your application.

Milkdown is built on top of some great libraries, such as ProseMirror, Y.js, and Remark, which means you can use their community and eco system to get help.

A plugin-driven WYSIWYG markdown Editor, inspired by Typora, built on top of prosemirror and remark.

The website is designed by Meo and Mirone. Powered by Theme Nord and Material Design.

For more information, please check our official documentation website.

You can check our Milkdown TODO project page to know what's on the plan.

You can also check milestones to know what's being worked on.
